author: brane
msg: Change the version numbering scheme, as per HACKING.
The -dev and (dev build) tags now indicate that we're moving _towards_
the version number defined by SVN_VER_MAJOR, _MINOR and _MICRO. Empty
strings in the tag defines indicate a released version.
* subversion/include/svn_version.h (SVN_VER_MINOR): Bump to 38.
(SVN_VER_TAG): Change to include the space and parentheses.
(SVN_VER_NUMTAG): Change to "-dev".
(SVN_VERSION): Don't include parentheses in the expansion.

author: josander
msg: * www/project_status.html: Advertising 1.0 beta1 in on friday, 20 Feb 2004

author: ghudson
msg: For convenience, create a params structure for svnserve's serve().
This way we don't have to change a half-dozen call sites each time we
want to add or remove a command-line flag to svnserve which affects
serve().
* svnserve/server.h, svnserve/serve.c
(serve_params_t): New structure.
(serve): Accept params instead of root, tunnel, and read_only.
* svnserve/main.c
(serve_thread_t): Contain params instead of root and read_only.
(serve_thread, main): Pass params to serve().

msg: * STATUS: nominate r8581 for 1.0.1
